author: rgardler
msg: - Use the "new" official apache repos (thanks David)
- remove some jars that are presnt in these "new" repos but not in the old ones
- change the chaperon dependency to one found in ibiblio as the original was only available in one of the "old" repo's - need to verify this is in fact the correct jar

author: thorsten
msg: Prefixing all targets with "droids." to make them unique and easier to integrate in any given ant project. Basing dependency management on ivy. Adding ivy descriptor to all plugins. Plugins as well are based on ivy for dependencies. See the protocol-httpclient-crowbar for an example. Removing all libs since they now got handled by ivy. Adding ivy as tool and creating a repository for jars that are not hosted by ivy/maven reps.

author: apetrelli
msg: Updated pom to reflect new changes.

author: pamarcelot
msg: Preferences are now displayed under the Schemas Editor "category".
